sentences.sContent: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
sentences.sCn: 该市长在打击毒品的斗争中行动不力。

synos.tran: 无效的，不起作用的；徒劳无益的
无用的人；无一技之长者

remMethod.val: in (不) + effect (效果) + ual (…的) → 不产生效果的 → 无效的

words.tran: 无效的，失效的；不起作用的

trans.tranOther: If someone or something is ineffectual, they fail to do what they are expected to do or are trying to do
